Movies.Plot: A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.

Movies.Title: Logan
Movies.Plot: In the near future, a weary Logan cares for an ailing Professor X, somewhere on the Mexican border. However, Logan's attempts to hide from the world, and his legacy, are upended when a young mutant arrives, pursued by dark forces.

Movies.Title: Fifty Shades Darker
Movies.Plot: While Christian wrestles with his inner demons, Anastasia must confront the anger and envy of the women who came before her.

Movies.Title: La La Land
Movies.Plot: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations for the future.

Movies.Title: The Great Wall
Movies.Plot: European mercenaries searching for black powder become embroiled in the defense of the Great Wall of China against a horde of monstrous creatures.

Movies.Title: Vixen
Movies.Plot: Vixen is based on the DC Character Mari McCabe / Vixen, a costumed superhero crime-fighter with the power to mimic the abilities of any animal that has ever lived on Earth.

Movies.Title: Doctor Strange
Movies.Plot: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

Movies.Title: xXx: Return of Xander Cage
Movies.Plot: Xander Cage is left for dead after an incident, though he secretly returns to action for a new, tough assignment with his handler Augustus Gibbons.

Movies.Title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
Movies.Plot: Alice returns to where the nightmare began: The Hive in Raccoon City, where the Umbrella Corporation is gathering its forces for a final strike against the only remaining survivors of the apocalypse.

Movies.Title: Suicide Squad
Movies.Plot: A secret government agency recruits some of the most dangerous incarcerated super-villains to form a defensive task force. Their first mission: save the world from the apocalypse.

Movies.Title: Tale of Tales
Movies.Plot: From the bitter quest of the Queen of Longtrellis, to two mysterious sisters who provoke the passion of a king, to the King of Highhills obsessed with a giant Flea, these tales are inspired by the fairytales by Giambattista Basile.

Movies.Title: Warcraft: The Beginning
Movies.Plot: As an Orc horde invades the planet Azeroth using a magic portal, a few human heroes and dissenting Orcs must attempt to stop the true evil behind this war.

Movies.Title: Transcendence
Movies.Plot: A scientist's drive for artificial intelligence, takes on dangerous implications when his consciousness is uploaded into one such program.

Movies.Title: Swamp Tigers
Movies.Plot: Footage of two tiger families living in the mangrove swamps of the Bay of Bengal.

Movies.Title: Tangled
Movies.Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical, Romance
Movies.Plot: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

Movies.Title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
Movies.Plot: After facing Shredder, who has joined forces with mad scientist Baxter Stockman and henchmen Bebop and Rocksteady to take over the world, the Turtles must confront an even greater nemesis: the notorious Krang.

Movies.Title: Sunshine
Movies.Plot: A team of international astronauts are sent on a dangerous mission to reignite the dying Sun with a nuclear fission bomb in 2057.

Movies.Title: Sucker Punch
Movies.Plot: A young girl is institutionalized by her abusive stepfather, retreating to an alternative reality as a coping strategy, envisioning a plan to help her escape.

Movies.Title: Super 8
Movies.Plot: During the summer of 1979, a group of friends witness a train crash and investigate subsequent unexplained events in their small town.

Movies.Title: Stranded
Movies.Plot: Four astronauts working at a lunar base suffer a meteor strike that brings an infection that leads to paranoia, fear and death.

Movies.Title: Treasure Buddies
Movies.Plot: Disney invites you on a treasure-hunting adventure with the Buddies!

Movies.Title: The Adventures of Rin Tin Tin
Movies.Plot: Rusty was orphaned in an Indian raid. He and his dog Rin Tin Tin were adopted by the troops at Fort Apache in Arizona, and helped establish law and order in and around Mesa Grande.

Movies.Title: Your Highness
Movies.Plot: When Prince Fabious's bride is kidnapped, he goes on a quest to rescue her... accompanied by his lazy useless brother Thadeous.

Movies.Title: We Bought a Zoo
Movies.Plot: Set in Southern California, a father moves his young family to the countryside to renovate and re-open a struggling zoo.

Movies.Title: Mr. Deeds Goes to Town
Movies.Plot: A simple, small town man inherits a massive fortune, making him the target for scammers and publicity-seekers. Overwhelmed by the turn his life has taken, and awoken to another use for his new-found fortune, he makes a momentous decision.

Movies.Title: Kong: Skull Island
Movies.Plot: A team of scientists explore an uncharted island in the Pacific, venturing into the domain of the mighty Kong, and must fight to escape a primal Eden.

Movies.Title: Snatched
Movies.Plot: When her boyfriend dumps her before their exotic vacation, a young woman persuades her ultra-cautious mother to travel with her to paradise, with unexpected results.

Movies.Title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
Movies.Plot: A naive man is appointed to fill a vacancy in the United States Senate. His plans promptly collide with political corruption, but he doesn't back down.

Movies.Title: Alien: Covenant
Movies.Plot: The crew of a colony ship, bound for a remote planet, discover an uncharted paradise with a threat beyond their imagination, and must attempt a harrowing escape.

Movies.Title: Atomic Blonde
Movies.Plot: An undercover MI6 agent is sent to Berlin during the Cold War to investigate the murder of a fellow agent and recover a missing list of double agents.

Movies.Genre: Animation, Action, Crime, Drama, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Movies.Plot: As Batman hunts for the escaped Joker, the Clown Prince of Crime attacks the Gordon family to prove a diabolical point mirroring his own fall into madness.

Movies.Title: Harlock: Space Pirate
Movies.Plot: Mankind is dying. Only one man can do anything about it, Space Captain Harlock, but the Gaia Coalition will stop at nothing to end him.

Movies.Title: DC's Legends of Tomorrow: Their Time Is Now
Movies.Plot: The producers introduce audiences to the characters and concepts of "Legends of Tomorrow", the upcoming spin-off of superhero series "Arrow" and "The Flash".

Movies.Title: Holiday Inn
Movies.Plot: At an inn which is only open on holidays, a crooner and a hoofer vie for the affections of a beautiful up-and-coming performer.

Movies.Title: You Can't Take It with You
Movies.Plot: A man from a family of rich snobs becomes engaged to a woman from a good-natured but decidedly eccentric family.

Movies.Plot: When their headquarters are destroyed and the world is held hostage, the Kingsman's journey leads them to the discovery of an allied spy organization in the United States. These two elite secret organizations must band together to defeat a common enemy.

Movies.Title: King Arthur: Legend of the Sword
Movies.Plot: Robbed of his birthright, Arthur comes up the hard way in the back alleys of the city. But once he pulls the sword from the stone, he is forced to acknowledge his true legacy - whether he likes it or not.

Movies.Title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
Movies.Plot: Jack Reacher must uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy in order to clear his name. On the run as a fugitive from the law, Reacher uncovers a potential secret from his past that could change his life forever.

Movies.Title: Starship Troopers: Traitor of Mars
Movies.Plot: Federation trooper Johnny Rico is ordered to work with a group of new recruits on a satellite station on Mars, where giant bugs have decided to target their next attack.

Movies.Title: Wonder Woman
Movies.Plot: When a pilot crashes and tells of conflict in the outside world, Diana, an Amazonian warrior in training, leaves home to fight a war, discovering her full powers and true destiny.

Movies.Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Horror, Mystery, Sci-Fi
Movies.Plot: Chris Redfield enlists the help of Leon S. Kennedy and Rebecca Chambers to stop a death merchant, with a vengeance, from spreading a deadly virus in New York.

Movies.Title: Cars 3
Movies.Plot: Lightning McQueen sets out to prove to a new generation of racers that he's still the best race car in the world.

Movies.Title: The Boss Baby
Movies.Plot: A suit-wearing, briefcase-carrying baby pairs up with his 7-year old brother to stop the dastardly plot of the CEO of Puppy Co.

Movies.Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
Movies.Plot: The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mystery of Peter Quill's true parentage.

Movies.Title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show
Movies.Plot: A newly engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must pay a call to the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-N-Furter.

Movies.Plot: Captain Jack Sparrow searches for the trident of Poseidon while being pursued by an undead sea captain and his crew.

Movies.Plot: Seven gunmen in the old west gradually come together to help a poor village against savage thieves.

Movies.Plot: The adventures of the last human alive and his friends, stranded three million years into deep space on the mining ship Red Dwarf.

Movies.Plot: Will Parker, played by Matthew Modine, loses the Americas Cup, the worlds biggest sailing prize, to the Australians and decides to form his own syndicate to win it back.

Movies.Plot: Mr. Hobbs wants to spend a quiet holiday at the beach, but his wife has invited all their family to stay with them.

Movies.Title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
Movies.Plot: Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker, who is unsettled by the strength of her powers. Meanwhile, the Resistance prepares for battle with the First Order.

Movies.Plot: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists the help of his newfound ally, Diana Prince, to face an even greater enemy.

Movies.Title: Avengers: Infinity War
Movies.Plot: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

Movies.Title: Tomb Raider
Movies.Plot: Lara Croft, the fiercely independent daughter of a missing adventurer, must push herself beyond her limits when she discovers the island where her father disappeared.

Movies.Plot: The Scorpion King teams up with a female warrior named Tala, who is the sister of The Nubian King. Together they search for a legendary relic known as The Book of Souls, which will allow them to put an end to an evil warlord.

Movies.Title: Christopher Robin
Movies.Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Family, Fantasy
Movies.Plot: A working-class family man, Christopher Robin, encounters his childhood friend Winnie-the-Pooh, who helps him to rediscover the joys of life.

Movies.Plot: At a top secret research facility in the 1960s, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that is being held in captivity.

Movies.Plot: When a murder occurs on the train he's travelling on, celebrated detective Hercule Poirot is recruited to solve the case.

Movies.Plot: Ballerina Dominika Egorova is recruited to 'Sparrow School,' a Russian intelligence service where she is forced to use her body as a weapon. Her first mission, targeting a C.I.A. agent, threatens to unravel the security of both nations.

Movies.Title: Rampage
Movies.Plot: When three different animals become infected with a dangerous pathogen, a primatologist and a geneticist team up to stop them from destroying Chicago.

Movies.Title: Constantine: City of Demons
Movies.Plot: An animated series centering on the adventures of supernatural detective John Constantine.

Movies.Title: Deadpool 2
Movies.Plot: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson (AKA. Deadpool), brings together a team of fellow mutant rogues to protect a young boy with supernatural abilities from the brutal, time-traveling cyborg, Cable.

Movies.Title: Furious
Movies.Plot: In the 13th century, an amnesiac soldier vows to get his revenge on the Mongol army that ransacked his village.

Movies.Title: Hotel Transylvania 3: Summer Vacation
Movies.Plot: Count Dracula and company participate in a cruise for sea-loving monsters, unaware that their boat is being commandeered by the monster-hating Van Helsing family.

Movies.Title: The Spy Who Dumped Me
Movies.Plot: Audrey and Morgan are best friends who unwittingly become entangled in an international conspiracy when one of the women discovers the boyfriend who dumped her was actually a spy.

Movies.Title: Thor: Ragnarok
Movies.Plot: Thor is imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, and must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

Movies.Title: Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets
Movies.Plot: A dark force threatens Alpha, a vast metropolis and home to species from a thousand planets. Special operatives Valerian and Laureline must race to identify the marauding menace and safeguard not just Alpha, but the future of the universe.

Movies.Title: Star Trek: Beyond
Movies.Plot: The crew of the USS Enterprise explores the furthest reaches of uncharted space, where they encounter a new ruthless enemy, who puts them, and everything the Federation stands for, to the test.

Movies.Title: Incredibles 2
Movies.Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Sci-Fi
Movies.Plot: Bob Parr (Mr. Incredible) is left to care for the kids while Helen (Elastigirl) is out saving the world.

Movies.Title: Skyscraper
Movies.Plot: A security expert must infiltrate a burning skyscraper, 225 stories above ground, when his family is trapped inside by criminals.

Movies.Title: Kin
Movies.Plot: Chased by a vengeful criminal, the feds and a gang of otherworldly soldiers, a recently released ex-con, and his adopted teenage brother are forced to go on the run with a weapon of mysterious origin as their only protection.

Movies.Title: Venom
Movies.Plot: When Eddie Brock acquires the powers of a symbiote, he will have to release his alter-ego "Venom" to save his life.

Movies.Title: Justice League: Throne of Atlantis
Movies.Plot: When Atlantian troops assault Metropolis as revenge for the death of their king, the Queen seeks help from the Justice League to find her son who has gone missing during the madness.

Movies.Title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom
Movies.Plot: When the island's dormant volcano begins roaring to life, Owen and Claire mount a campaign to rescue the remaining dinosaurs from this extinction-level event.

Movies.Title: The World Is Not Enough
Movies.Plot: James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot when he protects an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.

Movies.Title: Tomorrow Never Dies
Movies.Plot: James Bond heads to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.

Movies.Title: Never Say Never Again
Movies.Plot: A SPECTRE agent has stolen two American nuclear warheads, and James Bond must find their targets before they are detonated.

Movies.Title: Moonraker
Movies.Plot: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle, and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.

Movies.Title: Planet of the Apes
Movies.Plot: In 2029, an Air Force astronaut crash-lands on a mysterious planet where evolved, talking apes dominate a race of primitive humans.

Movies.Title: American Legends
Movies.Plot: Consists of new narration by James Earl Jones, which is interspersed with the Disney shorts John Henry (2000), Johnny Appleseed (1948), Paul Bunyan (1958), and The Brave Engineer (1950).

Movies.Title: Godzilla
Movies.Plot: The world is beset by the appearance of monstrous creatures, but one of them may be the only one who can save humanity.

Movies.Title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
Movies.Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Movies.Plot: After the Republic's victory on Christophsis, Anakin and his new apprentice Ahsoka Tano must rescue the kidnapped son of Jabba the Hutt. Political intrigue complicates their mission.

Movies.Title: Apocalypse Now
Movies.Plot: During the Vietnam War, Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade Colonel who has set himself up as a god among a local tribe.

Movies.Title: Pete's Dragon
Movies.Plot: The adventures of an orphaned boy named Pete and his best friend Elliot, who just so happens to be a dragon.

Movies.Title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
Movies.Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Movies.Plot: A young adventurer named Milo Thatch joins an intrepid group of explorers to find the mysterious lost continent of Atlantis.

Movies.Title: Valiant
Movies.Plot: At the height of WWII, a tiny wood pigeon enlists in the elite Royal Homing Pigeon Service to serve Britain, as the fearsome General Von Talon and his deadly squadron of falcons patrol the English Channel. Is he a war-hero in the making?

Movies.Title: Alice in Wonderland
Movies.Plot: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.

Movies.Title: Brother Bear
Movies.Plot: When a young Inuit hunter needlessly kills a bear, he is magically changed into a bear himself as punishment with a talkative cub being his only guide to changing back.

Movies.Title: Holes
Movies.Plot: A wrongfully convicted boy is sent to a brutal desert detention camp where he joins the job of digging holes for some mysterious reason.

Movies.Title: Superman/Doomsday
Movies.Plot: When LexCorps accidentally unleash a murderous creature, Doomsday, Superman meets his greatest challenge as a champion. Based on the "The Death of Superman" storyline that appeared in DC Comics' publications in the 1990s.

Movies.Title: Vexille
Movies.Plot: Japan, 2077: A female agent named Vexille is dispatched to Tokyo to investigate whether Japanese are developing robotic technology, which has been banned by the U.N. due to its potential threat to humankind.

Movies.Title: Pinocchio
Movies.Plot: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.

Movies.Title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
Movies.Plot: During an adventure into the criminal underworld, Han Solo meets his future co-pilot Chewbacca and encounters Lando Calrissian years before joining the Rebellion.
